an6.56:3.1: muddhani → muddhānaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | abhimattheyya → abhimatteyya (si); abhimaṭṭheyya (sya-all) | muddhani → muddhānaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ūhananti → hananti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); ohananti (sya-all)
an6.56:8.1: hānanda, phaggunassa → hānanda phagguṇassa (sya-all); pheggunassa ānanda (mr)
an6.56:10.2: na heva kho → no ca kho (mr)
